00027 namespace FiFiSDR {
00028   class receiver_control {
00029   public:
00030     typedef boost::shared_ptr<receiver_control> sptr;
00031     class __attribute__((__packed__)) presel_entry {
00032     public:
00033       presel_entry() : freq1_(0), freq2_(0), pattern_(0) {}
00034       presel_entry(double freq1_MHz, double freq2_MHz, boost::uint8_t pattern);
00035       double freq1_MHz() const; // [MHz]
00036       double freq2_MHz() const; // [MHz]
00037       double pattern() const { return pattern_; }
00038 
00039       friend bool operator==(const presel_entry& pe1, const presel_entry& pe2) {
00040         return (pe1.freq1_MHz() == pe2.freq1_MHz() &&
00041                 pe1.freq2_MHz() == pe2.freq2_MHz() &&
00042                 pe1.pattern()   == pe2.pattern());
00043       }          
00044       friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream&, const presel_entry&);
00045     private:
00046       boost::uint32_t freq1_; // [counters]
00047       boost::uint32_t freq2_; // [counters]
00048       boost::uint8_t  pattern_;
00049     } ;
00050 
00051     class si570_registers {
00052     public:
00053     private:
00054       boost::uint8_t regs_[6];
00055     } ;
00056     class si570_virtual_registers {
00057     public:
00058     private:
00059       boost::uint8_t regs_[6];
00060     } ;
00061 
00062     virtual ~receiver_control() {}
00063

00069     virtual std::string get_version_string() const = 0;
00070

00075     virtual void set_startup_frequency(double freq) = 0;

00078     virtual void set_xtal_frequency(double freq) = 0;
